class.name: AudioEffectStereoEnhance
class.brief_description: An audio effect that can be used to adjust the intensity of stereo panning.
class.description: An audio effect that can be used to adjust the intensity of stereo panning.

members.member: Values greater than 1.0 increase intensity of any panning on audio passing through this effect, whereas values less than 1.0 will decrease the panning intensity. A value of 0.0 will downmix audio to mono.
